sense.name: change
sense.commentary: TRANSFORMATION[+event] translation, transmutation, shift- the act of changing in form or shape or appearance
sense.examples: A photograph is a translation of a scene onto a two-dimensional surface.

sense.name: rule
sense.commentary: a rule describing the conversion of one syntactic structure into another related syntactic structure
sense.examples: Chomsky's first five rules pertain to phrase structure but the sixth is about transformations.

sense.name: function
sense.commentary: a function that changes the position or direction of the axes of a coordinate system
sense.examples: This program will do a polynomial transformation.

sense.name: DNA uptake
sense.commentary: modification of a cell or bacterium by the uptake and incorporation of exogenous DNA
sense.examples: Today we're studying regulation of fibronectin receptor distribution by transformation.
